statements: SELECT id, customer_name, email, phone_number, address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id > 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*), MAX(id) FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 'abcd1234';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status='pending'
SELECT customer_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'complete';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount, payments.payment_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 5
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInformation WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY total_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_amount FROM CustomerInformation JOIN PurchaseHistory ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInformation ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, username FROM CustomerInformation JOIN LoginCredentials ON CustomerInformation.customer_id = LoginCredentials.user_id;
